idea: Start a daily sketchbook challenge.
Write a short story inspired by a song lyric.
Create a photo series on a single color.
Design your own board game.
Make a collage from old magazines.
Try painting with unconventional tools.
Write a poem about your favorite place.
Create a stop-motion animation with household items.
Invent a new recipe and share it online.
Draw a comic strip about your day.
Make a vision board for your goals.
Write a song or piece of music.
Create a time-lapse video of a creative process.
Design a poster for a fictional event.
Try blackout poetry with a newspaper page.
Build a sculpture from recycled materials.
Write a letter to your future self.
Create a zine on a topic you love.
Make a short film with your phone.
Design a new logo for a favorite brand.
Try digital painting or illustration.
Write a script for a short play.
Create a series of abstract paintings.
Make handmade greeting cards.
Try a new craft like knitting or origami.
Write a blog post about a creative process.
Design a book cover for a classic novel.
Create a podcast episode on creativity.
Make a flipbook animation.
Draw a self-portrait in a new style.
Try photography with a new perspective.
Write a haiku every morning for a week.
Create a mural in your community (with permission).
Make a playlist that tells a story.
Try sculpting with clay or playdough.
Design a set of stickers.
Write a children’s story.
Create a diorama of a favorite scene.
Make a video tutorial for a creative skill.
Try painting with coffee or tea.
Write a letter to a historical figure.
Create a series of themed illustrations.
Make a scrapbook of your favorite memories.
Try a new art medium you’ve never used before.
Design a magazine cover.
Write a monologue for a character you invent.
Create a board game prototype.
Make a short documentary about a local topic.
Try urban sketching in your city.
Write a review of a creative work you admire.
